issue.title: [Python][Packaging] Remove pyarrow.s3fs import check from the recipe
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7389](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7389). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The nightly conda packaging tests are failing because of the recently removed s3fs module in favor of pyarrow.fs.
https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/branches/all?query=nightly-2019-12-13-0-azure-conda-linux-gcc-py27

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7389?focusedCommentId=16996278) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6032
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6032>
